Laurie turned around so quickly that she nearly toppled over. Her beautiful, sexy body had vanished, replaced by a bloated, chubby figure she didn't recognize. She tried to stay focused as she made her way back to the tub, her walk now turning into a waddle. She had stopped swelling for the moment, but Kristie hadn't been so lucky. Laurie could see her stomach blowing up like a balloon, rising from beneath the water like a miniature Island as it grew rounder and fatter by the second. Her stomach was now so large that it was making a squeaking noise as it pushed against the sides of the tub, continuing it's expansion. Her tits were heaving up and down as she began to breathe more heavily, and with each breath she took, they seemed to push out even more. On top of that, her butt was growing so wide that she was actually starting to inch up higher and higher, revealing more and more of her flabby gut.

She watched helplessly as Kristie gained a prominent double chin, her boobs sagged down over her massive gut and the bath creaked around her weight. She didn't know what to do...about herself...about Kristie...about any of this. What the hell was happening here?!

Her belly popped up and over the sides of the tub and her entire body burst free, slamming her right onto her back at Laurie's feet. She was at least twice the size of her room mate now, absolutely gigantic, and barely recognizable as the petite girl Laurie knew. All five hundred pounds of her quivered and shook as she lay helpless on the floor, pinned under her own massive gut, sobbing uncontrollably.

"This can't be happening...this can't be happening..." Laurie repeated to herself as she stared at her pudgy reflection.

15.content:
"Faterus?" Brandy asked, "What the heck is that?"

Brandy, a young, 22-year old blonde woman, had woken up that morning with extreme pangs in her stomach. At first, she thought she was just really hungry. But after a rather large breakfast, she decided to visit the doctor's as her hunger didn't go away. The older, graying doctor confirmed as he looked through the results.

"It's a very complicated illness," he said, "You're gonna be absolutely starving for the next 24 hours, no matter how much you eat or satiate yourself. You'll also be releasing gas quite frequently"

"Where did it come from?" she asked, clutching her growling stomach. The doctor just shook his head.

"We wish we knew," he replied, "This symptom has only started popping up earlier this year, mainly overseas. You're the first one in this state showing signs of it that I know of,"

Brandy gulped.

"What's gonna happen?"

"It's nothing serious or fatal, but you'll be experiencing some permanent changes. How much did you eat this morning?"

"Oh... I had a whole box of cereal, and when that didn't work I tried drinking a bunch of soda..."

The doctor calculated something in his head.

"Hmmm... 20-30ish pounds?" he said.

"What are you talking about?" Brandy asked.

"Well, for a while you won't change much. But over the next 24-hours, depending on how much you eat you'll gain permanent weight. From what we understand, it's impossible to lose if you gain it during your initial Faterus infection,"

"WHAT!?" Brandy gasped, "Bu-but, I'm so skinny, much skinnier than my friends! Are you telling me I have to starve?"

"Not completely starve, just maybe watching what you eat for the rest of the day. Your stomach is gonna constantly be miserable and starving, but you have to be careful of how you treat it,"

He went to the nearby cupboard and took out some tablets.

"Unfortunately, stomach relievers don't help, but I hear you may need these gas tablets for your releases..."

Brandy just rolled her eyes as she took them. She didn't need gas relief right now, she needed some stomach relief.

"What am I supposed to do now?"

"Just try to take it easy and try not to eat too much. It should mostly be gone after the period, but---"

"Ugh, whatever, thanks," Brandy scoffed as she left the room.

She couldn't keep her mind focused as her stomach rumbled and churned. She was sooooooo hungry but was told she was gonna gain weight?

"No way, my metabolism is great!" she thought, "I'm not gonna turn into a lardass or anything!"

As she walked outside, her butt rumbled a bit. PHHHFRT! A packed fart escaped her rear, entering the atmosphere. Brandy just scoffed as she toom out her gas tablets.

"Like I need these," she grunted as she chucked them into a nearby trash can, "I can handle a little poot or two..."

She walked off down the street, her released scent flowing through the city...

152.content:
"Hpmmh! I can't believe this. How can that doctor not have ANYTHING for my stomach pains. Gah! I've never been so hungry in my life." Brandy pouted as she strolled down the busy sidewalk. To make matters worse the streets were unusually crowded that afternoon. To make the situation more curious the crowd consisted entirely of women. Perhaps there was some sort of convention? "Ugh why are there so many people out today? Can't I have a little space to myself?" Brandy muttered as she slid her body through the mass of people walking the street oblivious to all of the contagious fumes she was emitting onto the vulnerable ladies.

"I'm so hungry!" Brandy wailed as she clutched her stomach. "I just have to take my mind off of my hunger. I should go visit my friends."

Brandy traversed across the city, passing by inestimable ladies, to reach her friend Wendy's house. Wendy was Brandy's childhood friend. She stuck with her through thick and thin and was someone she could always rely on. Despite her loyalty, Brandy determined to withhold her Faterus disease from her, it was just too bizarre.

Answering the door, Wendy was joyous to see Brandy. "Brandy! what a surprise!" Wendy squealed whole-heartedly embracing the infected Brandy, wrapping both arms around her. "You couldn't have come at a better time, I've got a bunch of guests." Wendy pulled Brandy inside eagerly dragging her to her friends. "Everyone this is my good friend Brandy." Wendy's introduction was immediately met with a jaunty welcome. "Brandy these are my friends from the gym, they're super fun." Brandy than scanned the room, observing fit athletic women. They were either super thin or athletically built.

Brandy was than approached by one of the athletic girls. "So you're Wendy's pal huh? You should come with us to the gym, its a girls only gym so you don't have to deal with lewd men. We were actually just about to go before you arrived." suggested the haughty gal. "Oh well uh I guess..." Brandy reasoned a trip to the gym would take her mind off of her relentless hunger. "Sweet! We'll go right after we finish lunch." the fit girl pointed at a table adorned with cake. "Is that ...cake? I didn't think women such as yourselves would eat that." a befuddled Brandy admitted. "I know right. These girls eat whatever they want but manage to burn it all off at the gym. Can you believe it." Wendy explained.

"Come on let's dig in!" ordered the haughty woman. "Oh I really shouldn't.." Brandy attempted to decline but her stomach loudly growled. "Oh come on! Eat up!" commanded the fitness enthusiasts slicing a huge slab of cake and ramming it into Brandy. "You know you shouldn't deprive yourself Brandy. Remember how anorexic you were in highschool." Wendy encouraged hearing Brandy's rumbling gut. Brandy, Wendy, and the gym girls gorged on tons of high calorie cake filling their bellies with the decadent dessert. Little did they know that they were all infected with Faterus the instant Brandy entered the room.

info.description:
Second Story, as the first one nears 100 chapters,

the basic premise, an event triggers the global fattening of everything, people, animals, everything gets fatter and fatter through some means or another

- it can be fantasy based weight gain but please no "and then she was 1000000 pounds after one cookie etc etc"

- male WG is fine, as is Animal WG, but these two things cannot be the driving point of the narrative, mainly additional points of it

-And by animal I mean as a sideline "oh look the cat got a bit chunky" not "anthro/furry shit"

- Slob is ok (to a point, no "and then they ate each others shit)

- No 3 word long entries - try for a paragraph or two

- "ok how about this" chapters, at all, they are so mind blowingly annoying and lazy

- no death/vore/stupidly obscene amounts of scat

- no underage shit

other then that, go on ahead
